context: Agricultural cooperative facing increased climate variability and drought conditions

request.purpose: Implementation of climate-resilient farming practices and irrigation systems
request.justification: Adapt to changing weather patterns and ensure long-term crop yields

decision_process.outcome: Identified drought and flood risks affecting 70% of acreage
Selected drought-resistant seed varieties and precision irrigation systems

business_impact.expected_outcome: 30% improvement in drought resilience, stable yields despite climate variability

lessons_learned: Member education and engagement critical for successful agricultural technology adoption, pilot programs demonstrate value before full implementation
